title: Interpretation of a dream about sweeping a house

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of sweeping the house in a dream or dreams by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com. Single, married, pregnant, man and young man. What is the interpretation of seeing a house sweeping in a dream for one girl: Seeing a single girl sweeping the house in a dream is a sign of many changes in her emotional and academic life. Seeing sweeping and cleaning the house for individuals in her dream shows her success in getting a wonderful job in the government Dreaming about sweeping the house with a broom is a sign of the kindness of her heart, her good intentions, and her love for good. See also: Interpretation of dreams about sweeping stairs. What is the interpretation of seeing the house sweeping in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman sweeping the house in a dream. A vacuum cleaner is a sign of bringing kindness and blessings to her husband, changing her husband’s condition for the better, and improving their standard of living. Seeing a married woman sweeping her house in a dream is a sign that we will hear good news soon. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman sweeping the house in a dream: Dreaming of a pregnant woman sweeping the house is a sign of comfort in her birth and good health, ending pregnancy and labor pains. Seeing cleaning the house with a broom in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates an opening. Wide gates for living after the arrival of the new baby. See also: Interpretation of a dream about cleaning the house. Interpretation of seeing a man sweeping the house in a dream: Seeing a man sweeping the house in a dream indicates the high morals of his wife and her long struggle with him to secure their future. Seeing a vacuum cleaner in a dream for a man is a sign of his long journey to secure the future of his children. Interpretation of seeing a sweeper sweeping the house in a dream: Dreaming of sweeping the house is a sign of the dreamer’s request for repentance from Almighty God and the beginning of a new, stable life. Seeing a sweeper in a dream is an indication of many changes in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a broom in a dream is a sign of the vision’s transition to a new place and the beginning of a quiet life there. See also: Interpretation of seeing autumn in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Ibn Sirin sweeping in a dream: Seeing sweeping in a dream has many interpretations, including many changes in the dreamer’s emotional life. Seeing a vacuum cleaner in a dream and sucking dirt as a sign of getting rid of all his sorrows and worries. Seeing The sound of a broom in a dream is a sign of psychological comfort and safety. Seeing a vacuum cleaner in a dream indicates the extreme sadness of the witness of the vision due to the many pressures and sorrows in his life. See also: Interpretation of seeing garbage in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing sweeping a poor man’s house in a dream: Seeing in a dream sweeping a poor man’s house is a sign of his humility. His help to others, the purity of his heart, and the strength of his generosity. Dreaming of sweeping a poor person’s house indicates his satisfaction and gratitude to God for His blessings and increase in his livelihood and wealth. See also: Interpretation of seeing garbage in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself sweeping the stairs of a stranger’s house in a dream: To dream that you are sweeping the stairs in a stranger’s house is a sign. However, the dreamer is distinguished by many good qualities and high morals. Seeing another person’s stairs in a dream is a sign of the strength of his personality and people’s love for him and his heart.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a piggy bank in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a piggy bank in a dream: A piggy bank is a box made of plastic or wood, and sometimes metal, and is used to store money. Many people see piggy banks in their dreams and start researching and questioning its meaning. In this article we show you what interpreters have found in seeing a piggy bank in a dream. You may be interested: Seeing 500 riyals in a dreamInterpretation of a piggy bank in a dreamInterpretation of a piggy bank in a dreamIf an unmarried woman sees in her dream a piggy bank full of money, this symbolizes good news soon But seeing him breaking a piggy bank in a dream symbolizes that it is a waste of money. But if you see a piggy bank in the shape of an animal, this indicates that he follows sects. Perhaps seeing a piggy bank in the shape of an animal in a dream for an unmarried girl symbolizes the approaching date of her marriage to a rich and powerful person, whether This bank was made of gold or silver. A piggy bank in a dream for a married woman. If she sees a piggy bank in her dream, this indicates that she is seeking to earn money and achieve her goals. If she sees her share being stolen in a dream, this indicates that there are many conflicts between her and those around her. While seeing her breaking her share The small one symbolizes neglecting her family and wasting her money. The water cycle in a dream. A piggy bank in a dream for a pregnant woman. When she finds a piggy bank in her dream, this indicates a lot of nutrition that she and her newborn will receive. Scientists said that if the piggy bank is large, this indicates one’s good fortune. Interpretation of cotton in dreams. Many people see cotton in a dream, and interpretation scholars have said that this has many connotations and meanings, and these meanings differ depending on the condition of the dreamer. Cotton in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a married woman who sees cotton in her dream: indicates the saving of money that will come soon to her and her family. It is suggested that God will compensate her for everything she went through. If this woman dreamed that she was growing cotton in her home, then this vision portends a good and legitimate plan for her and that she will defeat her enemies. But if she sees that they are selling cotton, this indicates a successful project that she will enter and earn a lot of money. Penguin in a dream. Cotton in a dream for a single girl. Seeing cotton in a dream may mean that her psychological state is good. This vision also tells her of good things to come. And if she finds that she is buying cotton, she will rise in status in her work, and this also indicates her excellence in her studies. Interpretation scholars said If an unmarried woman uses cotton in a dream, this indicates inheriting the money she will receive. Cotton in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees cotton in her dreams, this vision: This is considered good news for her and that she will give birth to a healthy child. As scholars of interpretation have mentioned, fields Cotton in a dream: If a married woman sees it in a dream, this foretells her good offspring, and spinning cotton indicates weakness and the soonest date of childbirth, and that it will be easy, God willing. .if he sees

title: Interpretation of a dream about cleaning the house

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cleaning a house: Cleaning a house is one of the necessary things in terms of cleanliness, faith, and prevention of diseases and insects. Seeing a clean house in a dream means the disappearance of worries and sorrows. Commentators differed in the interpretation of seeing a house being cleaned. Whether the vision is for a single, married, pregnant, or divorced woman, we will present it today. Through the Roya website, we will discuss the interpretation of the dream of cleaning the house in detail in a dream, based on the opinion of the great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq or modern-day interpreters. Follow us on the Roya website. Interpretation of seeing the house being cleaned in a dream by Ibn Sirin: I saw myself cleaning the house In a dream, braid the end of worry and anxiety. Watch the dusting of the house. Report material losses and leave work. I saw myself cleaning the house in a dream. It represents a change in life for the better. Interpretation of seeing a man cleaning the house in a dream. Seeing that he is cleaning the house from dust in the dream of an unmarried young man may indicate his repentance. From sins and misdeeds and the beginning of a new life. A man dreams of a house clean of dirt. It indicates his wife’s obedience to him and the family bond. Seeing buying cleaning tools in a man’s dream indicates a radical change in the man’s life and the stability of his marital life. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning the house for single women. If a girl sees that she is cleaning the house, it indicates This indicates the beginning of a new life, which may be an educational qualification, moving to a new job, or a marriage plan. Seeing cleaning the house in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates improved emotional relationships and may indicate an approach to sharing them. Seeing single women cleaning his house indicates that he has a master’s degree or Ph.D. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning the house for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself cleaning her house from dust and dirt, it indicates an improvement in their economic situation and the collapse of anxiety and anxiety. Seeing cleaning the house with water and soap in a dream for a married woman indicates, on her part, sins, family bonding, family happiness, and marital happiness. Seeing a house cleaned with a vacuum cleaner in a married woman’s dream can indicate hostility, marital conflict, and unstable opinions. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning a house for a pregnant woman: Seeing a house cleaned of dirt in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates easy birth, ease of birth, and good health for the newborn. Seeing her cleaning the house in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates Improved economic conditions and a sense of comfort and security. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning the house for a divorced woman or widow. If a divorced woman or widow sees that she is cleaning the house from dust, it indicates the beginning of a new life and the end of problems and worries. Seeing the house cleaned of dirt with water and soap indicates success and success in her life and distinguished work. Interpretation Dream of an unclean house. I saw in a dream that I was cleaning the house from dust. It indicates the achievement of success and the death of pain and troubles. The presence of dirt in the house in a dream can indicate anxiety, sorrows, bad news and problems. Seeing an unclean house will announce

title: Top 20 clues to seeing a cat feeding in a dream

preview.html: Feeding a cat in a dreamSeeing a cat eating a fish in a dream and seeing a black and white cat in a dream are nothing but dreams. The dreamer can learn their meaning by following this article, which contains interpretations by Ibn Sirin and other jurists: Feeding a cat in a dreamWhen a fortuneteller sees a cat in a dream and feeds it in a dream This proves the generosity, generosity, and benevolence that characterize him and appears in his life situations. If the dreamer sees a cat in a dream eating fish, this means that some people will persecute him, but he will be able to regain his rights soon and this is what makes him go through a long period of depression. It is best to start doing things that will help her move forward in life. When a woman sees her feeding the cat but she feels sad in sleep, this expresses the psychological damage she feels and the physical damage she feels, and it is better to pay more attention to her behavior. And that he will receive much good from the Most Gracious. Feeding a cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explains that feeding a cat in a dream is evidence of independence and starting a new life in a modern way, so the dreamer will be able to change his standard of living socially and financially, and if the dreamer sees a white cat in a dream, she fed him and felt Calmly after that, which symbolizes the abundance of goodness that will happen, and with a little effort. If he sees a male cat in a dream, and then the dreamer feeds it, this is an unpleasant vision, because it indicates betrayal that will come to him from the people closest to him. Dreaming of a piece of meat, it means that there is someone in his life who is deceiving him. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google, a site about the secrets of dream interpretation, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Feeding a cat in a dream to an unmarried womanIf you see an unmarried woman feeding a cat in a dream This proves her good morals, which appear in many of her situations. In addition, this vision shows the purity of her heart and her love for the good of everyone around her. If a dreamer sees a cat in a dream and then feeds it, in addition to her feeling of happiness, it expresses the appearance of good things in her. If a girl sees a cat In a dream and you tried to feed her but she ran away from her, this means that something bad will happen to her that will make her feel sad and depressed. Reducing automatic behavior. Feeding a cat in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself feeding a cat in a dream, this indicates her sincere desire to do the right things that will make her happy and bring her closer to the Lord (the Almighty and the Great). Almighty). If a woman notices that she is feeding a cat in her dream, and then raises some of her hands, this means that she will be betrayed by her relatives. Feeding a cat in a dream for a pregnant woman. When a pregnant woman dreams of feeding a cat, this expresses her clear compassion for those around her and her good behavior in situations. Difficult. If a cat will attack a woman in a dream after feeding her, this indicates that she will fall into many problems from which she cannot escape, in her need for the care and affection of her husband. Feeding a cat in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees a cat in a dream and then feeds it, this indicates On the blessings

title: I dreamed that I had a miscarriage and saw the fetus while I was pregnant

preview.html: I dreamed that I had a miscarriage and saw the fetus while I was pregnant in a dream. I dreamed that I had a miscarriage and saw the fetus while I was pregnant. I dreamed that I had a miscarriage and saw the fetus while I was pregnant in a dream. It may be a sign of pregnancy stress, and God knows the unseen. If a pregnant woman sees that she has had a miscarriage and sees the fetus, this may be evidence of safety and ease of childbirth, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a male child aborted, this may indicate goodness that will succeed, and God knows all unseen things. Likewise If a pregnant woman sees aborting a child in a dream, it can lead to safety and comfort, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. I dreamed that I married someone I love in a dream. I dreamed that I married someone I love in a dream, it could be evidence of success and achieving what you want, and God knows best, as marrying someone you love can show ability. The girl is able to achieve goals, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, the vision of marrying your lover and becoming pregnant may translate into an imminent marriage, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees that her parents do not approve of her marrying someone she loves, this may be a sign that she will not succeed or achieve goals, and God knows best. The unseen. I dreamed that I was walking on air in a dream. I dreamed that I was walking on air in a dream, perhaps good intentions will come, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, if a married woman sees herself walking on air in a dream, this may be a sign of the money she is earning, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees herself walking in the air, it may be a sign of travel, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees herself walking on the air in a dream, this may represent the strength she is gaining, and God knows all that we did not see. I dreamed that I expelled my mother from the house in a dream. I dreamed that I expelled my mother From home in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that the expulsion of relatives from the relatives’ house could lead to the severing of ties of kinship, and God knows best. Likewise, if the dreamer sees expulsion from his relatives’ house in a dream, this may indicate injustice by relatives, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees that she She was expelled from her home in a dream, as this may be evidence that she is going through a period of trouble and difficulties, and God is Great and All-Knowing. I dreamed that I was expelled from school in a dream. I dreamed that I was expelled from school in a dream. It could be a sign of distress and harassment, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees being expelled from school in a dream, this may lead to crises that he faces, and God knows all that he does not see. If a married man sees being expelled from school in a dream, this may be a sign of some problems with his wife. His family, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees Kurds from school in a dream, this may indicate anxiety, and God knows the unseen. I dreamed that my mother gave birth to a boy in a dream. I dreamed that my mother gave birth to a boy in a dream, it could be a sign of nourishment, and God is All-Knowing. In the event that the dreamer sees my mother giving birth to a male child In a dream, this may indicate goodness and sustenance, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a young man sees that he is giving birth to a child in a dream, this may indicate an extension of sustenance, and God knows best everything that he did not see.

If a married woman sees Kurds from school in a dream, this may indicate anxiety, and God knows the unseen. I dreamed that my mother gave birth to a boy in a dream. I dreamed that my mother gave birth to a boy in a dream, it could be a sign of nourishment, and God is All-Knowing. In the event that the dreamer sees my mother giving birth to a male child In a dream, this may indicate goodness and sustenance, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a young man sees that he is giving birth to a child in a dream, this may indicate an extension of sustenance, and God knows best everything that he did not see.

title: Interpretation of seeing chains and chains in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans The interpretation of seeing chains and strings in a dream, which is one of the dreams that causes terror to the soul and results in feelings of extreme anxiety, is for a person to see himself in his dream bound with ropes. Its interpretations also differ depending on the vision, whether he is a man, an unmarried girl, a married woman, or pregnant woman. Below is an explanation of the interpretation of a vision taking into account the restrictions of the great interpreters of dreams and visions, led by Ibn Sirin. We also discuss the various interpretations of this vision in detail as follows: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the vision of being bound by restrictions. Most interpreters of visions and dreams, led by Ibn Sirin, believe that seeing restrictions in a dream has many interpretations, as it is necessary to consider the dreamer’s condition, as well as the type of restriction that was binding. with it. Nipple. If the dreamer is sick with his vision that is connected to it, this indicates that the period of his illness will be prolonged. Considering the type of chains, if what the fortuneteller is holding on to is gold, this indicates that he is waiting for the return of something related to the past, but his wait will be long If the bracelet is silver, this indicates that the dreamer has made his decision to marry and intends to achieve it, and he is firm in his decision and there is no going back from it, so he sees himself tied in a dream with ropes. This also indicates steadfastness, but steadfastness in religion, and uprightness in its affairs. God knows best. It is a good vision for a person to see that he was able to break his restrictions, as it is a sign of overcoming adversity and difficulties and escaping from crises, God willing. Interpretation of the vision of complying with restrictions for an unmarried girl: It is not good for a single girl to see that she is limited in her dream, because restrictions are a sign of weakness, failure, and a sign of difficulties. Which she will face in her life and prevent her from achieving what she wants. Also, the shackles in an unmarried woman’s dream could be a sign of a strong conservative tendency in her family and that her family imposes some social restrictions on her, but if she sees that she is tied with ropes, this indicates her adherence to religion and her belief in it. . Resilience. She is a good girl, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision of complying with restrictions for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is bound with gold chains, this indicates that she is tied to something lost and is waiting for its return. Just as chains in a married woman’s dream indicate that she is feeling very distressed. And her dissatisfaction with her married life, as well as the lack of affection and tenderness from her husband, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing compliance with a man’s restrictions. Chains in a dream are generally considered a sign of the presence of enemies in the work environment or social occupants around the person and they want to harm him. If you have a question or dream that you want to explain Please feel free to send your question in the comment box and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing pimples on the body for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing pimples on the body for an unmarried woman. Skin problems that affect humans are among the most famous problems that many seek to solve in order to reduce their appearance and the side effects they cause of pigmentation and the appearance of unattractive pimples on the body for single and married women. Interpretation of a dream about seeing pimples on the bodyBody pimples In a dream, it is one of the most disturbing dreams for its owner, which actually affects his psychological and social state, and there are several indicators of this. Interpretation of a dream about seeing pimples on the body: If a man in a dream sees pimples on his body and they are large in size, this is a sign that the one who sees will get A lot of money if he engages in trade. Likewise, if the fortuneteller is an employee, then seeing pimples on his body indicates his promotion at work. But if the dreamer sees pimples on his leg, this indicates that the dreamer is energetic and active. Likewise, when the dreamer sees in a dream That there is only one grain on his body, this indicates the presence of a woman who controls his heart. His love for this woman makes him propose to her. But if the dreamer sees the presence of grains in his hand, this indicates a great provision from God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Qur’an in A dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing pimples on the face in a single woman’s dream. There are many dreams that people seek to have their own connotations, and pimples on the body or face are unpleasant things in real life. However, they are dreams that give good indicators, and here is seeing pimples on the face in a dream for a woman. Single woman: Seeing pimples in an unmarried girl’s dream means that there will be good news that she will be happy about. Also, for an unmarried woman to see in her dream with pimples and blisters, it means engagement soon after. On the other hand, when a girl sees pimples in her dream, And they are spread throughout her body, this indicates the presence of someone who loves her. Also, grains and spots in an unmarried woman’s dream indicate passion in general. As an unmarried woman, seeing grains in her dream indicates success in her studies and work as well. While spreading pills in a dream An unmarried woman on her body and neck indicates comfort and a stable life that the girl will enjoy. Also, seeing brown pimples is a sign that there are people in her life who are jealous of her. Also, seeing pimples on the face in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that there are mistakes in her life that need to be corrected. CorrectionAnd she thought about making decisions about her future life. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see a bus or a bus in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about birth control pills in the body for a married womanInterpretations of dreams for married women differ from those for unmarried women, which also differ depending on their color. Interpretation of a dream about birth control pills in the body for a married woman If a married woman sees black seeds in a dream, this indicates kindness and nourishment in her life. Also, a married woman who sees black seeds in a dream indicates many profits that her husband will enjoy.

title: Interpretation of seeing shaking hands with a dead person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing shaking hands with a dead person in a dream: Shaking hands is one of the good visions that indicate the goodness of the dreamer. Seeing a handshake with a dead person means the fulfillment of dreams, wishes, and success. Embracing a dead person means long life and good health for the pioneer. Shaking hands with a dead person indicates the peace of disputants, the loss of worry and grief, for the afflicted, and the repayment of debts. Shaking hands with a dead person and kissing him in a single woman’s dream. Seeing a handshake and kissing a dead person in a dream is one of the good dreams. Which indicates a lot of goodness for the seer or fortuneteller. An unmarried woman shaking hands with a deceased indicates the fulfillment of her dreams and desires. Shaking hands with a dead person also indicates good news and success in study or professional life. Shaking hands and greeting a deceased relative also indicates the girl’s upcoming marriage. Shaking hands with a dead person and kissing him in... A dream for a married woman: Seeing shaking hands with the dead and kissing a married woman is a wonderful vision and indicates a good situation in her life and finding solutions to her problems with her husband or family. The vision also indicates overcoming an ordeal and a crisis in her life. The vision indicates that she will soon hear good news that will change the course of her life for the better. Interpretation of a dream Peace be upon the dead while he is laughing. Seeing the dead laughing is a good vision that indicates that you will hear good news from the fortuneteller. It also indicates joy and joy for the forerunner and a happy occasion. To see the deceased wearing beautiful and clean clothes means that you will hear good news, success and luck for the fortuneteller. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the dead Alive and happy for divorced and widowed women. Seeing the dead happy and cheerful indicates good news and going through difficult stages. Seeing yourself kissing and greeting the dead person is a good dream that indicates good luck and the disappearance of worries and sorrows. Seeing the dead alive and talking with the living is a vision that indicates good news and a change in the dreamer’s life. For the better. Seeing the dead, shaking hands with the living, and smiling indicates the nearness of comfort and freedom from problems and pain. Shaking hands with a dead person in a dream. If a man sees that he is shaking hands with his deceased relative while he is in crisis or financial distress, this indicates the repayment of his debt and almost comfort. Also, seeing a handshake indicates the end of Anxiety and anxiety, and if a pregnant woman sees that she is shaking hands with a dead person, this means that she is free from pain and fatigue and that childbirth is also facilitated. Shaking the hand of a divorced or widowed woman in a dream means getting rid of problems and going through crises in peace. Interpretation of a dream of sitting with the deceased and talking to a divorced woman. Seeing her talking to the dead heralds It is good for the visionary and that her life will change for the better. It also indicates good news. Interpretation of the living complaining about the dead in a dream. Seeing the dead complaining about the living indicates the dreamer’s bad deeds and his many sins. Seeing the dead complaining about his condition to the living is evidence of his bad deeds and their end, and the dream is a warning to the living to stay away from Sins and obedience. Seeing the deceased in a dream speaks to the divorced. Seeing yourself speaking to the dead bodes well for the pioneer and plenty of sustenance. The vision also indicates long life and good condition. Greetings to the dead in a dream. Seeing greetings to the dead

title: Interpretation of dreams about curtains for married, pregnant and single women

preview.html: Dear brothers and sisters, friends of the Dream Interpretation website, we welcome you and wish you a good and useful workday, God willing. As follows: The goal of this thesis is to interpret the vision of curtains in a dream or the interpretation of the dream of curtains, as we, brothers, know all the interpretations contained in this context and discover the interpretation of the dream of curtains in a dream of a married and pregnant woman, as well as a single woman. We also know the importance of white and red curtains and more. As well as the interpretation of buying and installing curtains in a dream. All this and more you will discover in this article. I ask God Almighty to guide me to the topic and to formulate it in a way that satisfies the reader and the esteemed visitor. Interpretation of seeing curtains in a dream Curtains on doors and windows in a dream Concerns and fear with the safety of the outcome, the curtain on the door of the house from women, and the curtain from the window, window, or balcony from enemies The curtains on the door of the factory, shop or store are tired of livelihood, gathering and work, the curtains on the door of the mosque are a deficiency in religion, the new curtains are fleeting, the torn curtains are short or urgent relief, the body curtains are covers, the large curtains are varied and great care, and the curtains that flap in the wind or the wind are dangers. Which the fortuneteller looks at. Interpretation of buying curtains in a dream: A dream about buying curtains is a vision of marriage or engagement for a single woman, especially if the color in the dream is white. As for buying curtains in a married woman’s dream, it is a sign of increased expenses and is also an indication of the covering if it is white or blue. Buying curtains in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the presence of a male baby if the curtains are dark or made of linen. As for buying white or pink curtains made of transparent or soft fabric, this indicates the presence of a female, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about installing curtains. Most interpreters of the dream see that putting Curtains in a dream are a good omen for an unmarried girl who is about to get married, as this is interpreted by the good conduct of matters between the girl and her groom, and it also indicates the approaching date of marriage. wedding. As for putting up new curtains in a married woman’s dream, they indicate a good future if the curtains from the windows are green or blue. This interpretation applies to pregnant women, divorcees, and widows. In most cases, putting up curtains in a woman's dream explains a new stage in life filled with happiness, coverage and tranquility. As for a man who dreams of putting curtains on the windows of his house, he will receive a new baby. Or happy news knocks on his door related to livelihood and money or work and work. Putting curtains in a dream about a wedding if the color in the dream is red, but if the color is blue then this is a sign of travel. Placing yellow curtains indicates illness. Black curtains are a sign of sadness, loss, or bad news. Beautiful curtains in a dream Beautiful curtains in a dream for an unmarried girl or girl express emotional happiness, especially if they are green or pink, and beautiful curtains decorated with beautiful patterns such as flowers, roses, and trees herald the pregnancy of a married woman, Especially if the husband sees her
